sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>Reduce the difficulty of Improvised Detonation's check to Average (2 difficulty dice) and increase the damage dealt by the explosive to ranks in Intellect plus twice the character's ranks in Mechanics plus net success on the initial check (this includes the damage dealt on a premature detonation triggered by despair).</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Improvised Detonation (Improved)</name> <number>TAL0001253</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-05 22:50:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>4e7ee7652f18a850e0f497eef699b601</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-05 22:50:13</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
